articles.author: Ben Noll
articles.title: Where skies will be smoky this week — and where the haze is coming from - The Washington Post
articles.description: Wildfire smoke from Canada will expand across the Northeast and reach Europe this week as fires spread in the Western United States.
articles.content: Smoke from relentless wildfires in Canada was expanding across the Northeast early Monday after a weekend of smoke-filled air across the Midwest and Great Lakes. In the coming days, the smoke will sp… [+4679 chars]
